repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

commit.message:
Tune the thread-safe code in "__Pyx_GetItemInt_*()".

Extracted from https://github.com/cython/cython/pull/6587
Make sure we don't doubly wrap around on negative indices in PyPy, which also applies wraparound internally.
Fix "__Pyx_PyList_GetItemRef()" fallback implementation for negative indices.
Redistribute the macro guards in GetItem/SetItem utility code to get tighter adaptation in different configurations.
Fix "__Pyx_PyList_GetItemRef()" fallback implementations for negative indices and different macro configurations.
